description:
Retention of B1 use on ground floor; conversion of basement area to car park and upper three floors to residential and four additional floors for further residential, totalling 68 flats. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS:   4136/001; 011, 012, 101A-106A,                         Planning Statement - Dalton Warner                         Davis                         Marketing History - Strettons                         Daylight/Sunlight Report - BLDA                         Consultancy.
decision_conditions: This Council wishes to make the following observations: - the proposal for four additional storeys would be excessively out of scale with the Rosemary Gardens park area and the three and four storey domestic buildings characteristic of Southgate Road. - a more modest proposal of two additional floors would be considered appropriate in townscape terms.
